function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of novel coronavirus (COVID-19) causing a pandemic.","Impact":"Increased cases and deaths, overwhelmed healthcare systems, economic impact.","Mitigation":"Enforcement of strict health measures, travel restrictions, vaccine distribution.","Technologies":"Deep learning for face mask detection, contact tracing apps, vaccine development.","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations, travelers, business and financial sectors.","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare organizations, vaccine developers, technology companies."},{"Description":"Non-compliance with social distancing and mask-wearing guidelines accelerating the spread of COVID-19.","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus, increased cases, strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, enforcement of guidelines, penalties for non-compliance.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, public health communication tools, surveillance systems.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations, law enforcement.","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations, law enforcement agencies."},{"Description":"Limited use of deep learning techniques in object detection for face mask monitoring.","Impact":"Inaccurate detection, ineffective monitoring of mask-wearing behavior.","Mitigation":"Research and development of more accurate deep learning models, testing and validation of detection systems.","Technologies":"Deep learning, computer vision, data augmentation techniques.","People":"Healthcare workers, public health officials, researchers, technology developers.","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, public health organizations."}]}
